casebody.data:
CUNNINGHAM & BERGER
v.
SAMS. No. 64P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. J. Calvin Cunningham, Lexington, Lori Watson Berger, for Cunningham & Berger.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd day of February 2005 by Defendant for Sanctions:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
